```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

import altair as alt

def preview_data(df):
    print(df.head())
    hist = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        alt.X('Values', bin=True),
        y='count()'
    )
    return [df.head(), hist]

preview_data(data)

```
